mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_STUDENT (U_ID, U_PWD, U_PWD_Q, U_PWD_A, U_LAST_NAME, U_FIRST_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_BIRTH, U_PHONE, U_ZIPCODE, U_ADDRESS, U_ADDRESS_DETAIL) VALUES(#{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_pwd_q}, #{u_pwd_a}, #{u_last_name}, #{u_first_name}, #{u_email}, #{u_birth}, #{u_phone}, #{u_zipcode}, #{u_address}, #{u_address_detail})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDENT WHERE U_ID = #{u_id}
